title: What services does ICCU provide? - Quora

response.answer_text: a. We offer following services to all the car owners: b. 1) Gen. Service c. 2) Mechanical repairs d. 3) Accident Jobs & Denting & painting with full insurance claim. e. 4) Car A/c works f. 5) Insurance Renewal g. 6) Value added like: i. a) interior exterior polishing ii. b) anti rust coating iii. c) Teflon coating iv. d) anti fungal treatment h. 7) Brake down assistance 24x7 i. 8) Tuning j. 9) Remapping k. 10) Engine Scanner diagnostic for all Brands l. 11) Wheel Alignment & Balancing.
ICCU not only assist with you Car Servicing but also with Car Air Conditioning Service etc. do know more about ICCU you can visit ICCU
